clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Splendor X for Hair Removal
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of Splendor X for Hair Removal

brief_summary.textblock:
At least 40 healthy male or female subjects that wish to remove their hair will be enrolled to this study.
Each subject will receive five treatments at 6-8 weeks intervals. Subjects will return for follow-up visits at 3, 6, 9, and 12 months after the last treatment.

primary_outcome.description: change in number of hairs at 3 months following the last treatment as compared to baseline

intervention.description: The Splendor X has two wavelengths in one system: Nd:YAG (1064nm) and Alexandrite (755nm).
